alert.note: Alert for Brooks; Colquitt; Mitchell; Thomas; Worth (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 15 at 11:36AM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southeastern Mitchell, northeastern Thomas, northwestern Brooks, Colquitt and south central Worth Counties through 1215 PM EDT... At 1136 AM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Camilla to 7 miles northwest of Coolidge to near Thomasville. Movement was northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Moultrie, Pelham, Camilla, Norman Park, Doerun, Pavo, Coolidge, Riverside, Schley, Berlin, Funston, Sale City, Ellenton, Minton, Anderson City, Enon, Cotton, South Moultrie, Merrillville and Chastain. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 400 PM EDT for south central and southwestern Georgia.
